textPlain: I work at an e-waste recycling company[0]. We're so small that we don't even have a Windows domain, and our certifications and lack of Windows licensing mean that we can't sell anything with Windows. (Fine by me, I've recently had a dislike of Windows.) Because of those things, this is the first job I've had where I have the option of using Linux as a main driver. In fact, I have a mini desktop and a Microsoft Surface (of all things) that I run Linux on.[0] https://www.ebay.com/str/evolutionecycling
Pewdiepie has heralded the year of the Linux Desktop.
